pages.text: The Hunger is a unique mob that has interesting abilities related to enchantments.$(br2)It is able to consums items thrown into its mouth and store the enchantments with some sort of magic? It can then apply those enchantments to a new bare item thrown in. It is also able to push enchantments one level higher than their max when done properly.$(br)Interestingly enough, it can combine enchantments like Infinity and Mending, but refuses to do so on any sort of protection.
A very unique mob to say the least.
Hungers can camouflage to their environments, like this red sand variant
